passive.name: GOES WHERE HE PLEASES
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) GOES WHERE HE PLEASES
                                Resist the first immobilizing effects, losing 3% current Health instead and dropping a Chemical Canister nearby. Retrieving the Canister reduces the cooldown by 10 seconds and heals Dr. Mundo for 4% of his maximum health.Regenerates 1% of his Maximum Health every 5 seconds.Enemy champions destroy the Canister if they reach it first.Cooldown: 40s.

q.name: (Q) INFECTED BONESAW
q.description:
(Q) INFECTED BONESAW
 4s  
                                 50  ед.
                                
                                Throw his bonesaw, dealing magic damage equal to 20/23/26/29% of the target's current Health (min: 90/160/230/300) and slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds.Hitting an enemy heals Dr. Mundo for 25, or 50 on hitting a champion or monster.Deals up to 250/350/450/550 damage against monsters.

w.name: (W) HEART ZAPPER
w.description:
(W) HEART ZAPPER
 13/12/11/10s  
                                 5%
                                
                                Charges a defibrillator for 4 seconds, dealing 20/40/60/80 magic damage per second to nearby enemies.Re-cast: Detonates the defibrillator, dealing 20 magic damage (20/40/60/80 + 5% bonus ) to nearby enemies. If the detonation damaged an enemy, Dr. Mundo heals for 15% of the damage taken during Heart Zapper's duration. If it damaged a champion or monster he heals 30/35/40/45% instead.

e.name: (E) BLUNT FORCE TRAUMA
e.description:
(E) BLUNT FORCE TRAUMA
 8/7,5/7/6,5s  
                                 10/20/30/40 ед.
                                
                                Passive: Dr. Mundo gains 15/20/25/30, plus up to 30/40/50/60 Attack Damage based on his missing health.Active: Empowers his next attack to deal an additional 5 physical damage (5/20/35/50 + 5% bonus ), increased by up to 60% based on Dr. Mundo's missing health.Dr. Mundo swats the target away if it was killed or was a small monster, dealing the same damage to enemies.

r.name: (R) MAXIMUM DOSAGE
r.description:
(R) MAXIMUM DOSAGE
 70/65/60s  
                                
                                
                                Dr. Mundo's base Health is increased by 25/30/35% of his missing Health. He also gains Attack Damage (4% bonus ), 15/25/35% Movement Speed for 10 seconds and heals 15/35/55% of his maximum Health over the duration.

boots_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

example_build_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

runes_detailed.description: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it for 4 seconds, dealing bonus damage.
After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal over time based on missing health.
